text: Gordon Peter Getty (born December 20, 1933) is an American businessman, investor, philanthropist and classical music composer. He is the fourth child of oil tycoon J. Paul Getty. His mother, Ann Rork, was his father's fourth wife. Getty got control of Getty's US$2 billion trust after his father's death. His net worth was $2.1 billion in May 2019, making him number 383 on the Forbes 400 list of the wealthiest Americans. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:American philanthropists Category:American composers Category:Writers from Los Angeles Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles
title: Gordon Getty
